message: Hi there! I'm learning about artificial intelligence and would love to understand how machine learning models are trained.
I've been exploring the concept of neural networks and how they mimic the human brain's structure and function.
What are the practical applications of reinforcement learning in real-world scenarios today?
The field of natural language processing has evolved dramatically with the advent of transformer architectures.
When discussing AI ethics, we must consider both short-term practical issues and long-term existential risks.
